actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to continue the reduction of duties under the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States on gripping narrow fabrics of man-made fibers.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States, as amended by the Customs and Trade Act of 1990, to continue, through December 31, 1994, the reduction of duties on gripping narrow fabrics of manmade fibers.

titles.title: A bill to continue the reduction of duties under the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States on gripping narrow fabrics of man-made fibers.
